DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate tolerability subcutaneous needle-free injection device use administer Fuzeon , compare standard needle/syringe supply commercial Fuzeon . The anticipated time study treatment < 3 month , target sample size < 100 individual .
DOC.brief_title: WAND Study - A Study Evaluate Fuzeon ( Enfuvirtide ) Administered Needle-Free Injection Device Patients With HIV .
DOC.criteria: male female patient , > =18 year age HIV1 infection ; previously treat antiretroviral agent . prior use Fuzeon T1249 ; inability selfinject ; active , untreated opportunistic infection .
